name: collected
description: A chrome extension to remove posts from your facebook news feed with user defined words

scripts.build: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -a src/styles dist && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/  --inline --hot --progress --color
scripts.build:chrome: NODE_ENV=chrome && mkdir -p extension && cp -a manifest.json extension && cp -a src/index.html extension && cp -a src/content.js extension && cp -a icons extension && cp -a src/styles extension && webpack -p
scripts.build:chrome:dev: NODE_ENV=chrome && mkdir -p extension && cp -a manifest.json extension && cp -a src/index.html extension && cp -a src/content.js extension && cp -a icons extension && cp -a src/styles extension && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/  --inline --hot --progress --color
